name: Department of Shady Business
description:
It only took one experiment for you to decide to quit the Department of Shady Business. You are a shadow diver now. Use your power wisely, but try not to get caught on your way out. Avoid your fellow employees and remember: shadows disappear in the light.

Controls:

Arrows to move.

 Shift to dive/surface.

Note: For best experience download the executable
